info.infoString: Adjust your mirrors correctly
If the car don't start turn high beams on
Use hand brake regularly
Don’t turn the wheels beforehand when making a left turn
Maintain required distance always from other vehicles
Don’t turn the wheels beforehand when making a left turn
Park with precision
follow the vehicle of neighbouring lane
Be careful with signs on roads as well as traffic lights
Always follow the speed limits
Give pedestrians the right-of-way in crosswalks
Always check your seat belt
Park with precision
Keep winter Survival kit in winter time
plan route in advanced for long trips
Don't take alcohol and drugs while drive
Don't assume that other cars know what you are doing
Don't play loud music in your vehicle
Don't Talk on your cellphone and drive
Don't treat your vehicle like a toy
Don't leave your valueables in your car
Give priority to emergency vehicles
If you face an accident make sure nobody in car is injured
Check the conditions of other side vehicles
Call Police immediately
Stay at the scene
Stay Calm and contact your insurance provider
Give your liscence and other documents to Insurance and Police
Don't be Abusive
